Name: Coloring Game: Little City
About the game: A theme-based sequel of the popular Coloring Game (coloring by numbers). The sequel is dedicated to the life in the Little City. The images have been designed to resemble isometric computer games. Complete the image â€“ and the city will come to life again. The game options are identical to those in the Coloring Game. You have access to 15 free images (>150,000px)
